abstract: Several big banks are reportedly refusing to help Clear Channel Communications refinance its debt after being forced to uphold lending commitments in the buyout of the radio and billboard giant last year.
snippet: Several big banks are reportedly refusing to help Clear Channel Communications refinance its debt after being forced to uphold lending commitments in the buyout of the radio and billboard giant last year.
lead_paragraph: Update | 4:01 p.m. Several big banks are reportedly not feeling the love for Clear Channel Communications after being forced to uphold lending commitments in the buyout of the radio and billboard giant last year.

headline.main: Clear Channel Denies It Is in Talks To Restructure
